page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I rise at 7:30am and eat a sandwich of peanut butter or chocolate spread and have a drink of lemonade.I watch T.V. until 8am,then I wash and dress.After washing the dishes I get ready for my 8:30 school journey by bus. I arrive at school for 8:50 and I distibute the registers.I return to my class where the teacher marks the register.Morning school consists of English,playtime and Maths.During break I play{tig}and other games.Then we have lunch in the large hall.For lunch I have a sandwich ,yogurt and drink of lemonade.{Some {children have school lunch.}We have a break until 1:15pm. In the afternoon,I give out registers and have library, P.E.,singing and story lessons. When I get home I change my clothes and help mother.If allowed after tea I play out until 8pm.I watch T.V. or do jobs until bedtime at 9:15pm.
